{{cpp/experimental/fs/title|file_time_type}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header | experimental/filesystem}}
{{dcl | since=fs_ts | 1=
using file_time_type = chrono::time_point&lt;/*trivial-clock*/&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Represents file time. {{tt|trivial-clock}} is an implementation-defined type that satisfies {{named req|TrivialClock}} and is sufficient to represent the resolution and range of the file time values offered by the filesystem.
